message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it has immense potential and I'm willing to offer it to you at a competitive price of $800000. I think this is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $750000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $775000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $775000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer, so I'm counteroffering at $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm willing to make a small adjustment to my previous offer, so I'm counteroffering at $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I've made several concessions already, and I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer $815000 for the product. If this is still not acceptable, I'll have to consider buying from John at $1500000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
